title: Medieval Europe and the Feudal System

vocab.definition: A medieval system where land was exchanged for loyalty and service
A large estate with a lord's house and surrounding farmland
A peasant who was bound to work on a lord's land
The code of honor and behavior expected of knights
A person who received land from a lord in exchange for loyalty

teachingNotes: Explain the hierarchy of feudal society. Discuss how the system provided protection and organization during uncertain times.

sample.question: What was the medieval system where land was exchanged for loyalty and service?

truefalse.question: Serfs were free to leave their lord's land whenever they wanted.

multiplechoice.question: Who was at the top of the feudal hierarchy?

fillintheblank.question: A peasant bound to work on a lord's land was called a ________.

shortanswer.question: What did knights promise to their lords in exchange for land?
